activities: PreventionGenetics processes personal information collected and used in conjunction with genetic laboratory tests ordered by qualified healthcare providers. Personal information is strictly collected and used to provide the requested services in the manner in which they were requested.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data processed includes demographic data and personal health information for individual patients in electronic, verbal and manual (paper) communications as well as personal information of healthcare professionals, business partners and others collected and used in the context of business operations.
recoursemech: PreventionGenetics has committed to cooperate with the applicable EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
